name: Personal Dashboard Home
description: A clean, airy mobile dashboard featuring a personalized greeting, a horizontal scrolling list of suggested actions with rich illustrative cards, and a simple todo list section.

render.notes: I used CSS gradients and absolute positioning to recreate the 'painting' style of the main card (desert house) as requested, rather than using an external image. The layout uses flexbox for the horizontal scroll area to ensure it behaves natively on mobile.
